steps.name: I want to use "Chrome" driver
I want to use url "https://katalon-demo-cura.herokuapp.com/profile.php#login"
I open web driver
I fill field "id->txt-username" with "John Doe"
I fill field "id->txt-password" with "ThisIsNotAPassword"
I click on element "id->btn-login"
I wait for web condition "urlContains->#appointment"
I should see element "id->combo_facility"

name: [CuraHealthcare] Authentication
description:
As a user of Cura Healthcare web app
  I should be able to authenticate

steps.name: I want to use url template "${PROTOCOL}://${DOMAIN}${ENDPOINT}"
I want to use url protocol "https"
I want to use url domain "jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"
I want to use url endpoint "/albums"
I want to use request header "Content-Type" as "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
I want to use request form param "userId" as "1"
I want to use request form param "title" as "My album title"
I want to use request method "POST"
I send the request
I should have response with status code "201"
I should have response json attribute "userId" equals to "1"
I should have response json attribute "title" equals to "My album title"
I should have response json attribute "id" present
I want to use url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums"
I want to use request header "Content-Type" as "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
I want to use request form params as
I send "POST" request
I should have response with status code "201"
I should have response json attributes equals to
I want to use url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "jsonplaceholder/request/POST-create-album.json"
I send "POST" request
I should have response with status code "201"
I should have json response with reference from file "jsonplaceholder/response/POST-create-album.json"

name: [Jsonplaceholder][Albums] Create an Album
description:
As a User of Jsonplaceholder API
  I should be able to create albums

steps.name: I want to use url template "${PROTOCOL}://${DOMAIN}${ENDPOINT}"
I want to use url protocol "https"
I want to use url domain "jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"
I want to use url endpoint "/albums/1"
I want to use request method "DELETE"
I send the request
I should have response with status code "200"
I want to use url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums/1"
I send "DELETE" request
I should have response with status code "200"

name: [Jsonplaceholder][Albums] Delete an Album
description:
As a User of Jsonplaceholder API
  I should be able to delete albums

steps.name: I want to use url template "${PROTOCOL}://${DOMAIN}${ENDPOINT}"
I want to use url protocol "https"
I want to use url domain "jsonplaceholder.typicode.com"
I want to use url endpoint "/albums/1"
I want to use request method "GET"
I send the request
I should have response with status code "200"
I should have response json attribute "id" present
I should have response json attribute "userId" present
I should have response json attribute "title" present
I want to use url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums/1"
I send "GET" request
I should have json response with reference from file "jsonplaceholder/response/GET-album-1.json"

name: [Jsonplaceholder][Albums] Read an Album
description:
As a User of Jsonplaceholder API
  I should be able to read album details

steps.name: I want to use url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums"
I send "GET" request
I should have json response with reference from file "jsonplaceholder/response/GET-albums.json"

name: [Jsonplaceholder][Albums] Read Albums List
description:
As a User of Jsonplaceholder API
  I should be able to read albums list

steps.name: I want to use url "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums/1"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "jsonplaceholder/request/PUT-update-album.json"
I send "PUT" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I should have json response with reference from file "jsonplaceholder/response/PUT-update-album.json"

name: [Jsonplaceholder][Albums] Update an Album
description:
As a User of Jsonplaceholder API
  I should be able to update an album

steps.name: I want to use url "https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize"
I want to use request query params as
I don't want to follow redirects
I send "GET" request
I should have response header "Location" present
I save response header "Location" as scenario param "authenticationRedirect"
I want to use "Chrome" driver
I want to use url "${authenticationRedirect}"
I open web driver
I fill field "id->login-username" with "esensqatraining@yopmail.com"
I fill field "id->login-password" with "Passwd1!"
I click on element "id->login-button"
I wait for web condition "urlContains->#access_token="
I save driver url in scenario params as "urlAfterAuthentication"
I extract regexp "_token=(.*)&token_" from "urlAfterAuthentication" to "authenticationToken"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/users/2g5o4vq6ayxp9eo5xlqw6os2k/playlists"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "spotify/request/POST_create_playlist.json"
I send "POST" request
I should have response with status code "201"
I should have response json attributes present
I should have response json attributes equals to
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/users/2g5o4vq6ayxp9eo5xlqw6os2k/playlists"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "spotify/request/POST_create_playlist.json"
I send "POST" request
I should have response with status code "401"
I should have response json attributes equals to

name: [Spotify][Playlists] Create a Playlist
description:
As a user of Spotify Api
  I should be able to create Playlists

steps.name: I want to use url "https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize"
I want to use request query params as
I don't want to follow redirects
I send "GET" request
I should have response header "Location" present
I save response header "Location" as scenario param "authenticationRedirect"
I want to use "Chrome" driver
I want to use url "${authenticationRedirect}"
I open web driver
I fill field "id->login-username" with "esensqatraining@yopmail.com"
I fill field "id->login-password" with "Passwd1!"
I click on element "id->login-button"
I wait for web condition "urlContains->#access_token="
I save driver url in scenario params as "urlAfterAuthentication"
I extract regexp "_token=(.*)&token_" from "urlAfterAuthentication" to "authenticationToken"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/me"
I want to use request headers as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I save response json attribute "id" as scenario param "userId"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/playlists"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request query params as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I save size of response json array "items" as scenario param "nbPlaylistsBefore"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/users/${userId}/playlists"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "spotify/request/POST_create_playlist.json"
I send "POST" request
I should have response with status code "201"
I save response json attribute "id" as scenario param "newPlaylistId"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/playlists"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request query params as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I save size of response json array "items" as scenario param "nbPlaylistsAfter"
I should have scenario param "nbPlaylistsAfter" greater than scenario param "nbPlaylistsBefore"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${newPlaylistId}"
I want to use request headers as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I save size of response json array "tracks.items" as scenario param "nbTracksBefore"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${newPlaylistId}/tracks"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "spotify/request/POST_add_tracks.json"
I send "POST" request
I should have response with status code "201"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${newPlaylistId}/tracks"
I want to use request headers as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I save size of response json array "items" as scenario param "nbTracksAfter"
I should have scenario param "nbTracksAfter" greater than scenario param "nbTracksBefore"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${newPlaylistId}"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request json body from file "spotify/request/PUT_update_playlist.json"
I send "PUT" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${newPlaylistId}"
I want to use request headers as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I should have response json attributes equals to
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${newPlaylistId}/followers"
I want to use request headers as
I send "DELETE" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I want to use url "https://api.spotify.com/v1/me/playlists"
I want to use request headers as
I want to use request query params as
I send "GET" request
I should have response with status code "200"
I save size of response json array "items" as scenario param "nbPlaylistsAfter"
I should have scenario param "nbPlaylistsAfter" equals to scenario param "nbPlaylistsBefore"

I fill field "id->username" with "tomsmith"
